text: (jazzy music)

- [Narrator] Preparing
data for machine learning
can be time-consuming and tedious,
often taking weeks or months.
But with Amazon SageMaker Data Wrangler,
you can aggregate and prepare data
for machine learning in minutes.
It's data preparation made simple
and all from a single visual interface.

Data selection,
exploration, transformation,

and visualization become
a fast and easy process.

SageMaker Data Wrangler allows
you to select and import data

from various sources and
generate the data quality
and insights report to verify quality,
while detecting abnormalities.

Imagine normalizing,
transforming, and combining data

to create features all
without having to write
a single line of code.

That's the power of SageMaker
Data Wrangler's 300-plus

built-in data transformations
and library of code snippets.

You can even author
custom transformations.

With SageMaker Data
Wrangler's visualizations,
you can run exploratory data analysis,

identify potential errors, and
quickly preview and inspect

that transformations are
completed as intended,
all from Amazon SageMaker Studio,

the first fully-integrated
development environment

specifically designed
for machine learning.
Go from preparation to production

with a single click and
even automate workflows.
You can export your flow to a notebook,
you can launch a SageMaker processing job,
or launch model training directly
within SageMaker Data Wrangler.

Get started with Amazon
SageMaker Data Wrangler,

the fastest and easiest
way to prepare data
for machine learning.
(jazzy music)
